name: Boss Madam Irish
greetingText: I really love your nose, lips, eyes, smile, anad especially your curly hair. I love you entirely <33
wishText: I wish you all the best thing in life, and I hope laloves that you will remain by my side forever. As I was trying to become the best for you. I know you are the best for me, and I will do everything to make you happy. I love you so much <3
